name: pg-studio
description: A local-first desktop application for visualizing PostgreSQL schemas.

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:ui && npm run build:desktop
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/shared && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/introspection && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/schema-parser && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/file-scanner && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/export-manager && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/error-handler && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/performance && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/layout-engine && npm run build --workspace=@pg-studio/schema-builder
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run pack --workspace=@pg-studio/desktop
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run dist --workspace=@pg-studio/desktop
